test.name: Cenário 05 - Efetuar login sem informar as credenciais

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: David, estou abrindo o navegador e maximizando-o!
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: David, estou abrindo o navegador e maximizando-o!
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: David, estou abrindo o navegador e maximizando-o!

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: Também estarei iniciando a gravação da tela
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Também estarei iniciando a gravação da tela
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Também estarei iniciando a gravação da tela

kw.name: Start Gif Recording
kw.doc: Starts the recording of a GIF in the background with the specified ``name``. The recording can be stopped by calling the `Stop Gif Recording` keyword.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: DADO que estamos na página inicial do BugBank
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.arg: BugBank | O banco com bugs e falhas do seu jeito
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'BugBank | O banco com bugs e falhas do seu jeito'.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: ENTÃO a mensagem de erro "Usuário e senha precisam ser preenchidos" será visível em tela
kw.sourcename: ENTÃO a mensagem de erro "${msgError02}" será visível em tela

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '//*[@id="modalText"]' contains exact text 'Usuário e senha precisam ser preenchidos'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Stop Gif Recording
kw.doc: Stops the GIF recording and generates the file. If ``embed`` argument was set to ``True`` the GIF will be displayed in the log file.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
